ARABIC: فَأَرَادَ أَن يَسْتَفِزَّهُم مِّنَ ٱلْأَرْضِ فَأَغْرَقْنَٰهُ وَمَن مَّعَهُۥ جَمِيعًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He wanted to scare them from the land but We drowned him and every one of those with him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Then he sought to turn them out of the land, but We drowned him and all his followers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: At last Pharaoh decided to uproot Moses and the Children of Israel from the land, but We drowned him together with all who were with him;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: The Pharaoh wanted to expel the Israelites from the land so We drowned him and all who were with him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: He therefore wished to expel them from the earth, so We drowned him and his companions, all together.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: So he resolved to turn them out of the land. But We drowned him and all who were with him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: So he desired to destroy them out of the earth, but We drowned him and those with him all together;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: He desired to startle them from the land; and We drowned him and those with him, all together.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And he wished to scare them from the land, but We drowned him and those with him, all together.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: So he resolved to scare them out of the land: but We drowned him along with all those who were with him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Then he besought to unsettle them from the land; wherefore We drowned him and those with him, all together.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: He desired to exterminate them from the land, so We drowned him and all those who were with him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: So he resolved to remove them from the face of the earth: but We did drown him and all who were with him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: So he resolved to turn them out of the land (of Egypt). But We drowned him and all who were with him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Pharaoh sought to provoke them so that they would leave the land, but We drowned him, together with all who were with him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He resolved to scare them off the land, but We drowned him, and those with him, altogether.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: So he intended to drive them from the land, but We drowned him and those with him all together.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [17:103] And he, Pharaoh, desired to scare them, to expel Moses and his people, from the land, the land of Egypt; so We drowned him and those with him, all together.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And he wished to scare them from the land) the land of Jordan and Palestine, (but We drowned him) in the sea (and those with him, all together).
